translation.en: [Suchi] Many wrote to the Chinese government.
translation.zh: ‎很多人写信给中国政府 ‎（马上就做 尼姆斯）

translation.en: From all over the world.
translation.zh: ‎全世界各地的朋友都行动了起来

translation.en: [Nims] I also started to get support from the mountaineering community.
translation.zh:
‎（你是一名斗士
‎拥有狮子般强大的心脏） ‎我也开始得到登山者群体的支持

translation.en: -Yeah! Hey, Nims. Conrad. -Jimmy. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎（康拉德安加：好耶！
‎尼姆斯及团队 给这些人点正能量） ‎-嗨 尼姆斯 我是康拉德
‎-我是吉米 ‎（登山运动员 康拉德安加）

translation.en: Shout-out to you, man. You've got Shishapangma.
translation.zh:
‎告诉你 哥们
‎你得到了希夏邦马峰登山许可

translation.en: You're the man. Crush it.
translation.zh: ‎干得漂亮 征服它

translation.en: It is a project not only for himself,
translation.zh: ‎这个计划不仅仅是为了他自己 ‎（探险家 迈克霍恩）

translation.en: but for Nepal, for the Sherpas, for mountaineering.
translation.zh:
‎也是为了尼泊尔
‎为了夏尔巴人 为了登山运动 ‎（真正终结者）

translation.en: [Suchi] The Chinese government saw the whole world is supporting him.
translation.zh: ‎中国政府看到全世界都在支持他

translation.en: [Nims] Finally, the news came through that
translation.zh: ‎最终 我们收到了消息

translation.en: the Chinese were opening the mountain for me and my team.
translation.zh: ‎中国将为我和我的团队开放这座山

translation.en: One mountain to go.
translation.zh: ‎最后一座山了

translation.en: Let's do this.
translation.zh: ‎让我们努力完成吧

translation.en: This is my last mountain.
translation.zh: ‎这是我要征服的最后一座山

translation.en: Let's take it slow.
translation.zh: ‎我们要慢慢来

translation.en: Let's make it really easy.
translation.zh: ‎我们要把爬山过程变得简单

translation.en: That was the plan. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我们是那样计划的

translation.en: [in Nepali] What's up with this weather?
translation.zh: ‎天气怎么回事？

translation.en: Gesman. Gesman, brother.
translation.zh: ‎盖斯曼 兄弟

translation.en: We need to tie the ropes.
translation.zh: ‎我们需要系上绳索

translation.en: [in English] It was horrendous.
translation.zh: ‎很可怕

translation.en: [in Nepali] We were really worried.
translation.zh: ‎我们真的担心

translation.en: No one had climbed Shishapangma since 2014.
translation.zh:
‎自2014年以来
‎没有人攀登过希夏邦马峰

translation.en: [Nims in English] It's an avalanche.
translation.zh: ‎发生了雪崩

translation.en: [in Nepali] Who is my team? Can we do this?
translation.zh: ‎我的团队里有谁？我们能做到吗？ ‎（明玛戴维夏尔巴的叙述）

translation.en: These are the questions you ask yourself in this kind of situation.
translation.zh:
‎这些都是你会在这类状况下
‎扪心自问的问题

translation.en: But the project had become our dream,
translation.zh: ‎但这个计划已成为我们的梦想

translation.en: and we were focused on making it come true.
translation.zh: ‎我们致力于将它变成现实

translation.en: [Nims in English] In life, you have to keep doing what you believe.
translation.zh: ‎在生活中 你必须做你相信是对的事

translation.en: You have to ask yourself, do you really want this from your heart?
translation.zh:
‎你得问自己
‎这是你内心真正想要的吗？

translation.en: Is it for the self-glory?
translation.zh: ‎这是为了自我荣誉吗？

translation.en: Or is it for something bigger?
translation.zh: ‎还是为了更高的目标？

translation.en: Sometimes, the idea that you come up with
translation.zh: ‎有时 世界上没有人认为

translation.en: may seem impossible to the rest of the world,
translation.zh: ‎你的想法有可能实现

translation.en: but that doesn't mean it's impossible to you.
translation.zh: ‎但这并不是说你不可能实现

translation.en: And if you can inspire one or two people in a good way,
translation.zh:
‎如果你能以出色的方式
‎给予一两个人正向的激励

translation.en: then you can inspire the world.
translation.zh: ‎那么你就能激励整个世界

translation.en: Yes! Shishapangma! Yeah!
translation.zh:
‎（希夏邦马峰顶
‎2019年10月29日） ‎太好了！希夏邦马峰！太棒了！

translation.en: When I was on the summit, I got on the radio.
translation.zh: ‎我登顶后 接通了无线电

translation.en: [in Nepali] Mum…
translation.zh: ‎妈妈

translation.en: [in English] I said, "Mum, you know that project I was talking about?"
translation.zh:
‎我说：“妈妈
‎还记得我和你说的那个计划吗？

translation.en: "That is over."
translation.zh: ‎计划圆满完成啦”

translation.en: We did it.
translation.zh: ‎我们做到了

translation.en: [Kamal] Mum obviously was very ill.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈明显病得非常厉害

translation.en: But she's a very stubborn lady.
translation.zh: ‎但她是极为倔强的女性

translation.en: She hang on, she fight, she fight, she fight until her youngest son succeeds.
translation.zh:
‎她咬牙坚持 与命运抗争
‎她一直坚持到她的小儿子取得成功

translation.en: [Nims] For her to be part of that moment of success
translation.zh: ‎她参与了这个重要的成功时刻

translation.en: and to be able to celebrate that together,
translation.zh: ‎与我们一起欢庆

translation.en: nothing can beat that, bro.
translation.zh: ‎简直是最棒不过的事 兄弟

translation.en: [Kamal] My mum said, "Kamal, he has got godly spirit."
translation.zh:
‎我的妈妈说：“卡玛尔
‎他拥有虔诚的精神”

translation.en: She was… [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎她是…

translation.en: [Nims] Hi, Mingma.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 明玛

translation.en: -[man] Congratulations. -Thank you. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-恭喜
‎-谢谢

translation.en: -Congratulations. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-恭喜
‎-谢谢

translation.en: [Suchi] I always knew he doesn't give up.
translation.zh: ‎我一直确信他不会放弃

translation.en: I had so many gray hairs because of the stress that I was going through.
translation.zh:
‎因为我经受的压力非常大
‎所以我长了很多白头发

translation.en: It was a roller coaster.
translation.zh: ‎过程真是一波三折

translation.en: [in Nepali] We made the impossible possible by our teamwork.
translation.zh:
‎通过团队合作
‎我们将不可能变成了可能

translation.en: Good leadership is also required to achieve success,
translation.zh: ‎成功还需要出色的领导能力

translation.en: and Nims demonstrated that very well.
translation.zh: ‎尼姆斯就展现出了优秀的领导能力

translation.en: [Mingma in Nepali] Reaching that international level
translation.zh: ‎达到那种国际水平

translation.en: is a big help for Nepali climbers in the future.
translation.zh: ‎对尼泊尔登山者的未来有巨大的帮助

translation.en: Hey, guys. Now we have climbed 14 highest mountains in the world. Right?
translation.zh:
‎伙计们 现在我们已经征服了
‎世界上最高的14座山峰 对吧？

translation.en: Let's be brutally honest,
translation.zh: ‎我们坦诚地说

translation.en: if this was done by some European or Western climber,
translation.zh:
‎如果这个计划
‎是由一些欧洲或西方登山者完成的

translation.en: the news would have been ten times bigger than this.
translation.zh:
‎那么相关新闻报道量
‎会比现在多出十倍

translation.en: Let's give the justice to the people who really deserve the justice.
translation.zh:
‎让我们公平地对待
‎真正值得公平对待的人

translation.en: And you guys have the power.
translation.zh: ‎你们有这种能力

translation.en: Let's unite, let's make a difference.
translation.zh: ‎我们联合起来 让世界变得不一样

translation.en: [in Nepali] Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢

translation.en: [Nims in English] Project Possible team!
translation.zh: ‎“可能性计划”团队！

translation.en: He has all my respect.
translation.zh: ‎我非常尊敬他

translation.en: He did this with his strategy.
translation.zh: ‎他用自己的策略完成了计划

translation.en: [Messner] And he did it first.
translation.zh: ‎而且他是率先这么做的

translation.en: This was a unique statement in the history of mountaineering.
translation.zh: ‎这会在登山史上写下独特的一章

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢

translation.en: What's next, mate?
translation.zh: ‎接下来是什么呢 哥们？

translation.en: Well, I haven't even started it.
translation.zh: ‎我还没有开始

translation.en: And you know what? Next, we go even bigger.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗？
‎接下来 我们的目标会更宏伟

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: ‎走了

translation.en: See you soon, okay?
translation.zh: ‎再见 好吗？

translation.en: Just wait and see.
translation.zh: ‎走着瞧吧

translation.en: And I mean it.
translation.zh: ‎我是认真的

translation.en: See us again.
translation.zh: ‎再见
